short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KO! for Facebook helps you to block tracking and collecting your data on websites you visit outside of facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KO! protects your privacy when you visit websites by blocking Facebook tracking tools, KO For Facebook blocks all Facebook tracking tools like pixels, embedded plugins, buttons, and all Facebook tools that tracks your activity outside Facebook.
